name: Scrap prices from any page with HTML/CSS, Cloud Vision and MonkeyLearn
description: This template helps you perform data mining on on a website at regular intervals. First, a screenshot of the url is taken via HTML/CSS. Then, the screenshot's text is recognized with Google Cloud Vision (OCR) and the price is automatically extracted with a MonkeyLearn machine learning model. Eventually, the result is stored in Google Sheets.
